section.title: Schedule
section.para: The following milestones represent the overall future requirements and deliverables intended to be impactful to the end user and consumer. They represent distinct points of usefulness and completion.

tr.td: Respecification of existing code features to match desired level of detail
Reimplementation and certification of existing code features using performance enhancing integration with Dyalog interpreter
Enhancement of compiler to deal with n-body and black scholes benchmarks
Support for the array-oriented tree transformation algorithm
